verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> being <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G71>led<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>,

<S%G3985>Being<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> he did <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3756%G3762>nothing<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G4931>ended<s%>, he <S%G5305>afterward<s%> <S%G3983>hungered<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1488>be<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2036>command<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G4314%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, It is written <S%G1125><s%> , That <S%G3754><s%> man <S%G444><s%> shall <S%G2198><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> word <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%>, <S%G321>taking<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G321>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%>, <S%G1166>shewed<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G3625>world<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G4743>moment<s%> of <S%G5550>time<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G537>All<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> that is <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G1698>me<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3739>to<s%> <S%G1437>whomsoever<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.
<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> wilt <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799%G3450>me<s%>, <S%G3956>all<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Get thee <S%G5217><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> , Satan <S%G4567><s%> : for <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> , Thou shalt worship <S%G4352><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> him <S%G846><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> shalt thou serve <S%G3000><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1488>be<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%> from <S%G1782>hence<s%>:

<S%G1063%G3754>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, He shall <S%G1781>give<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G4012>over<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, to <S%G1314>keep<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>:

<S%G2532%G3754>And<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> they shall <S%G142>bear<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G142>up<s%>, lest at any <S%G3379>time<s%> thou <S%G4350>dash<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, It is said <S%G3754%G2046><s%> , Thou shalt <S%G1598><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> tempt <S%G1598><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G1228>devil<s%> had <S%G4931>ended<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3986>temptation<s%>, he <S%G868>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G891>for<s%> a <S%G2540>season<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> there went <S%G1831>out<s%> a <S%G5345>fame<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the region round <S%G4066>about<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%>, being <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%>, <S%G3757>where<s%> he had <S%G2258>been<s%> brought <S%G5142>up<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1486>custom<s%> <S%G2596>was<s%>, he <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> stood <S%G450>up<s%> for to <S%G314>read<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> there was <S%G1929>delivered<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G380>opened<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%>, he <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%>,

The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is upon <S%G1909><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> , because <S%G1752><s%> he hath anointed <S%G5548><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to preach the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to the poor <S%G4434><s%> ; he hath sent <S%G649><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to heal <S%G2390><s%> the brokenhearted <S%G4937%G2588><s%> , to preach <S%G2784><s%> deliverance <S%G859><s%> to the captives <S%G164><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> recovering of sight <S%G309><s%> to the blind <S%G5185><s%> , to set <S%G649><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> liberty <S%G859><s%> them that are bruised <S%G2352><s%> ,
To preach <S%G2784><s%> the acceptable <S%G1184><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4428>closed<s%> the <S%G975>book<s%>, and he gave it <S%G591>again<s%> to the <S%G5257>minister<s%>, and sat <S%G2523>down<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of all <S%G3956>them<s%> that <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> were <S%G816>fastened<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, This <S%G3754><s%> day <S%G4594><s%> is <S%G4137><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> scripture <S%G1124><s%> fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3140>bare<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G5485>gracious<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G2076>Is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph's<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, Ye will <S%G2046><s%> surely <S%G3843><s%> say <S%G2046><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> proverb <S%G3850><s%> , Physician <S%G2395><s%> , heal <S%G2323><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> : whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> done <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Capernaum <S%G2584><s%> , do <S%G4160><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> country <S%G3968><s%> .

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213%G3754><s%> , No <S%G3762><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> accepted <S%G1184><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his own <S%G846><s%> country <S%G3968><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> a truth <S%G225><s%> , many <S%G4183><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Elias <S%G2243><s%> , when <S%G3753><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> was shut up <S%G2808%G1909><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> months <S%G3376><s%> , when <S%G5613><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> throughout <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> ;

But <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> was <S%G3992><s%> Elias <S%G2243><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> , save <S%G1508><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Sarepta <S%G4558><s%> , a city of Sidon <S%G4605><s%> , unto <S%G4314><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> that was a widow <S%G5503><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> lepers <S%G3015><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> in the time <S%G1909><s%> of Eliseus <S%G1666><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> was cleansed <S%G2511><s%> , saving <S%G1508><s%> Naaman <S%G3497><s%> the Syrian <S%G4948><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> all <S%G3956>they<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>, when they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, were <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G2372>wrath<s%>,

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1330>passing<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> went his <S%G4198>way<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> came <S%G2718>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>, a <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G846%G2258>them<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the sabbath <S%G4521>days<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>, which <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G1140>devil<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> cried <S%G349>out<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, Let us <S%G1436>alone<s%>; <S%G5101>what<s%> have we to <S%G2254>do<s%> with <S%G4671%G2532>thee<s%>, thou <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3479>Nazareth<s%>? art thou <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>? I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> thou <S%G1488>art<s%>; the Holy <S%G40>One<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Hold thy peace <S%G5392><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> him <S%G846><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> when the <S%G1140>devil<s%> had <S%G4496>thrown<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%>, he <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G984>hurt<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3367>not<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2186>stood<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>, and <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G4446>fever<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>: and <S%G3916>immediately<s%> she <S%G450>arose<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.
